title: Ep. 25. Petals to the Metal - Chapter Eight
description: This episode is basically a self-contained Fast and the Furious movie, if that film franchise incorporated actual arcane magicks, rather than just "movie magic." Magnus does some risky jumping. Merle takes a tumble. Taako summons a new best friend.
author: shows@themcelroy.family (The McElroys)
